memberdef.name: STRIP_OPTIONAL
memberdef.initializer: template <typename... Ts> \ auto IDENTIFIER(Ts &&... xs) \ { \ const auto result = connection.IDENTIFIER(std::forward<decltype(xs)>(xs)...); \ if (result) { \ return result.get(); \ } else { \ using value_type = typename std::decay<decltype(result)>::type::value_type; \ return ALTERNATE; \ } \ } \ static_assert(true, "")

memberdef.name: FORWARD_TO_SIMULATION_API
memberdef.initializer: template <typename... Ts> \ decltype(auto) IDENTIFIER(Ts &&... xs) \ { \ return connection.IDENTIFIER(std::forward<decltype(xs)>(xs)...); \ } \ static_assert(true, "")

memberdef.name: RENAME
memberdef.initializer: template <typename... Ts> \ decltype(auto) TO(Ts &&... xs) \ { \ return connection.FROM(std::forward<decltype(xs)>(xs)...); \ } \ static_assert(true, "")
